Managing in the game Handy:
If you want to participate in the game, please let one of the 4 governors of the Arena! Each Arena can hold a maximum of 12 participants, 6 for each team! Minimum 2 teams of 2!
Reviewer, the Damned, the Offender (Chaotic character), this game is for everyone, except those who participates in the competition or Cuba Kratei!
